document.full_text: the death of dr. daniel kliman, a prominent pro-israel activist, in a san francisco elevator shaft in 2008 is the subject of a lawsuit being heard in san francisco superior court.
document.title: lawsuit lays out activist's death by elevator
lines_and_colors: the death of dr. daniel kliman, a prominent pro-israel activist, in a san francisco elevator shaft in 2008 is the subject of a lawsuit being heard in san francisco superior court.
